### Tender Description

The Consultant is responsible for achieving an integrated design for the reconstruction of the Lakeshore Trail. The Consultant Team will work collaboratively with Parks Canada Agency as a cohesive multi-disciplinary team.

### Bidder’s Conference
A bidders' conference will be held via teleconference on November 15, 2022. The conference will begin at 1:00 PM CST.

### Enquiries and Submissions
All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing. B
